title: Platform batch: Explorer list view + subgraph hardening + redeem Permit2 + env/tooling
description: Implement Explorer list view toggle (keep grid default), harden ERC-8004 subgraph client (variables + metadata cache), add redeem Permit2 path, harden /api/opensea, unify env modules, align scripts/docs to Bun, and seed a minimal DB schema.

title: Explorer: add list view toggle + URL search params
description: Add TanStack Router search schema for Explorer and implement a list/paginated view toggle (keep grid default). Filters/search/pagination should be shareable via URL.

title: Explorer: true incremental loading for grid
description: Implement incremental loading for the grid Explorer (load additional subgraph pages as users pan into higher indices), respecting active search/filters.

title: ERC-8004 subgraph client: variables + count + metadata cache
description: Refactor src/lib/erc8004/subgraph.ts to use GraphQL variables, add safer agent count via agentsConnection when available, and add metadata URI promise caching.

title: Redeem: add Permit2 (redeemWithPermit) path
description: Add Permit2 signature flow and call redeemer.redeemWithPermit to reduce transactions; keep classic path as fallback.

title: API: harden /api/opensea (validation + caching + env)
description: Add zod validation + proper HTTP errors + TTL caching + promise dedupe to /api/opensea; use env module for OPENSEA_API_KEY.

title: Repo: unify env modules + switch scripts/docs to Bun
description: Make Bun the sole script runner (update package.json + README), expand src/env/client.ts with VITE_* vars used by redeem/subgraph, remove src/lib/env.ts, and update imports accordingly.

title: Theme: make ThemeProvider Provider-based + strict missing-provider detection
description: Adjust ThemeProvider to use Context.Provider + undefined default so missing-provider detection works; keep ScriptOnce early theme.

title: DB: seed minimal Drizzle schema (redeem_events)
description: Add a minimal Drizzle schema (e.g., redeem_events) and export from schema index; keep server-only DB accessor.

title: Verification: bun check-types/lint/build + basic UI smoke
description: Run bun run check-types/lint/build and do a quick manual smoke test of Explorer toggle + redeem flows.
